name: Game Over, Daisy! Deluxe
storyline: After conquering Sarasaland in the name of the Koopa King, you've been tasked with making sure the princess you pilfered is well acquainted with her new role before the airship returns to Bowser's Castle.
summary: After conquering Sarasaland in the name of the Koopa King, you've been tasked with making sure the princess you pilfered is well acquainted with her new role before the airship returns to Bowser's Castle.
